tcg

Interface IAttack

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAttack, ElectricAttack, FightingAttack, FireAttack, GrassAttack, PsychicAttack, WaterAttack

    public interface IAttack
    Common interface for all the attacks. Every attack have a name, base damage, descriptive text and a cost

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack(IPokemon aPokemon)
      An attack damages a Pokemon based on the attack's base damage, it's type and the type of the Pokémon that receives the attack.
      int getBaseDamage()
      Getter for the base damage of an attack
      int getCost()
      Getter for the cost of the attack.
      java.lang.String getDescriptiveText()
      Getter for the descriptive text of an attack
      java.lang.String getName()
      Getter for the name of the attack

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        void attack(IPokemon aPokemon)
        An attack damages a Pokemon based on the attack's base damage, it's type and the type of the Pokémon that receives the attack.
        Parameters:
        aPokemon - the tcg that receives the attack

      • getBaseDamage

        int getBaseDamage()
        Getter for the base damage of an attack
        Returns:
        Base damage of the attack

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Getter for the name of the attack
        Returns:
        the name of the attack

      • getDescriptiveText

        java.lang.String getDescriptiveText()
        Getter for the descriptive text of an attack
        Returns:
        the descriptive text of the attack

      • getCost

        int getCost()
        Getter for the cost of the attack. Every attack have a cost that must be paid with energy cards stipulated.
        Returns:
        the amount of energy cards
